DataElement.preferredName: Umbilical Cord Blood Arrival Facility Complete Frozen Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the umbilical cord blood was completely frozen when it arrived at your facility.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Umbilical Cord Blood Arrival Facility Complete Frozen
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Blood from the placenta (afterbirth) that contains high concentrations of stem cells needed to produce new blood cells._The act of reaching a destination._Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._The act or event which causes the transition from a liquid to solid matter phase.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Blood present in the umbilical vessels at the time of delivery. If cryopreserved at birth, cord blood can serve as a source of autologous lymphocytes for transplantation to a patient later diagnosed and treated for leukemia or lymphoma.

Concepts.definition: Blood present in the umbilical vessels at the time of delivery. If cryopreserved at birth, cord blood can serve as a source of hematopoietic progenitor cells for transplantation to a patient later diagnosed and treated for a hematopoietic disorder.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of reaching a destination.:Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.:Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.:The act or event which causes the transition from a liquid to solid matter phase.

Concepts.definition: The act of reaching a destination.
Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
The act or event which causes the transition from a liquid to solid matter phase when the temperature is lowered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.
